title: Government, allies on board to tackle nation’s challenges: Danyal Ch
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 25 (APP):Pakistan Muslim League Nawaz (PML-N) leader Danyal Chaudhry said on Tuesday that all the allies, including the Pakistan People Party (PPP) were on board and ready to solve the country’s challenges.
Talking to private news channel, he said that allies had grievances and disagreements on the development funds of Public Sector Development Program (PSDP) but these issues must resolve through consultation and dialogue.
“The funds will be distributed equally among all the MNAs and MPAs without any discrimination” he added. Danyal emphasized that PML-N supports the politics of deliverance. “The major projects in the country were being inaugurated by our party” he said.
